name: Balanced Diet (1800 Calories)
description: A well-rounded diet with a mix of protein, carbohydrates, and fats.
dinner: Baked salmon with quinoa and vegetables

name: Low Carb Diet (1600 Calories)
description: A diet that restricts carbohydrate intake and focuses on protein and healthy fats.
breakfast: Omelette with spinach and feta cheese
dinner: Zucchini noodles with pesto and grilled chicken

name: Vegetarian Diet (1500 Calories)
description: A plant-based diet with a variety of vegetables, legumes, and grains.
breakfast: Smoothie with spinach, banana, and almond milk

name: High Protein Diet (1700 Calories)
description: A diet focused on consuming ample amounts of protein for muscle building and satiety.
breakfast: Greek yogurt with protein powder and nuts
lunch: Grilled chicken with quinoa and mixed greens

name: Mediterranean Diet (1600 Calories)
description: A diet inspired by Mediterranean cuisine, rich in vegetables, fruits, and olive oil.
lunch: Greek salad with olives and feta cheese

name: Moderate Calorie Diet (2000 Calories)
description: A balanced diet providing moderate calorie intake for various nutritional needs.
dinner: Baked chicken with sweet potato and vegetables

name: Active Lifestyle Diet (2300 Calories)
description: A diet suitable for an active lifestyle with higher energy requirements.
lunch: Quinoa salad with grilled vegetables and chicken
dinner: Salmon with brown rice and steamed broccoli

name: High Energy Diet (2500 Calories)
description: A diet providing higher energy intake for individuals with intense physical activities.
lunch: Grilled steak with potatoes and mixed greens
dinner: Pasta with marinara sauce and lean ground turkey
